document_data.name: ''Turabin's Cleansing Trinket''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Turabin's Cleansing Trinket''''' was an enchanted [[ring]], named after one of the ancient [[wizard]]s of [[Myth Drannor]]. It was part of the ''Fading Rings'' set.
document_data.Description: ''Turabin's'' [[ring]] was a band of [[crystal]] that sparkled in light.
document_data.Powers: The ''Cleansing Trinket'' granted the wearer increased protection from magic and allowed them to ''[[dispel magic]]'' at will. The ring possessed nine charges of ''dispelling''.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], ''Turabin's Cleansing Trinket'' came to be possessed or possibly crafted by a mysterious monument, ''the Great Stone Head'', located in the [[Nightingale Court]] in the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]]. In exchange for one of the ''[[eidolon]]s'', small totem statues depicting various gods and individuals, the monument dispensed powerful magic rings, one being the protective band of crystal, ''Turabin's Cleansing Trinket''.
